tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SupplyChainData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name TEXT,
    producer TEXT,
    supplier TEXT,
    location TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    blockchain_hash TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE movement_tracking (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  action VARCHAR(255),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions ( 
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    from_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    to_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE product_inventory ( 
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
    quantity INT NOT NULL, 
    manufacture_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    expiry_date DATE NOT NULL, 
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_history ( 
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    product_id INT NOT NULL, 
    transaction_id INT NOT NULL, 
    operation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL 
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    manufacturer_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Location (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    city VARCHAR(100),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Shipment (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    source_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    destination_location_id INT NOT NULL,
    shipment_date DATE,
    blockchain_hash VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_data (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    batch_number VARCHAR(50),
    supplier VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    tx_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    from_address VARCHAR(100),
    to_address VARCHAR(100),
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE product_provenance (
    trace_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    batch_number VARCHAR(50),
    producer VARCHAR(100),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    tx_id INT REFERENCES blockchain_transactions(tx_id),
    trace_id INT REFERENCES product_provenance(trace_id),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_locations (
    location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(150),
    address VARCHAR(255),
    country VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
